nodes.text: Bars Barka was a planet located in Bars Barka system, within the Barsa sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim and New Territories. It was connected to the Varvva system by a hyperspace route. Several decades before the outbreak of the Clone Wars in the year 22 BBY, the planet's Ubese colonists were devastated by the lethal Intestinal Revenge of Bars Barka, a global illness believed to have been transmitted by a Neimoidian trade delegation that resulted in crippling weight loss. Between 12 and 13 ABY, Bars Barka fell within the borders of the New Republic.

Bars Barka was first mentioned in the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, a 2001 Star Wars Legends reference book written by Ben Burtt and illustrated by Sergio Aragonés. The Essential Atlas, 2009 a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, placed the Bars Barka system, and therefore Bars Barka itself, in grid square J-6.
